Gamil Ratib (Arabic, 18 August 1926 - 19 September 2018) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ pụtara na telivishọn na ihe nkiri na obere oge na ihe nkiri karịa ọrụ afọ 65
A maara ya maka ọtụtụ ọrụ ọjọọ na mpụta ya na ihe nkiri akụkọ ihe mere eme nke asụsụ Bekee Lawrence of Arabia
A mụrụ ya n'afọ 1926 na Cairo n'ezinụlọ ndị Egypt nke a maara maka ịhụnanya ha nwere maka nka, e zigara Ratib ịmụ nka na Paris
Ịhụnanya ya maka ime ihe nkiri sitere na ihe nkiri French, nke ọ gụrụ na Mahadum nke France, tupu o mee ihe nkiri mbụ ya n'afọ 1945
Ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri a na-enye onyinye dị ukwuu na mba ya bụ Egypt na France, ebe ọ rụrụ ọrụ na mba abụọ ahụ, gụnyere inye ya Legion of Honour
Na France, Ratib lụrụ nwanyị French ma nye ya nwa amaala France.
